dataset_info.name: ODRL Valid Policy Dataset - Unified Format
dataset_info.description: Standardized approved policies for generation and validation evaluation

policies.policy_text: Access to the dataset 'MuseumArtifact' is granted only to approved UC4 dataspace participants. Participants must connect using registered connectors listed in the UC4 dataspace registry (e.g., 'https://uc4-dataspace.example.com/connector1'). Connections from unregistered endpoints are automatically denied.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Access is restricted to registered connectors and approved participants, ensuring measurable and enforceable constraints without ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy clearly defines technical access constraints

policies.policy_text: Access to the dataset 'CulturalHeritageImages2020' is permitted only for users registered as researchers in the DRK Dataspace program.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Only registered researchers may access the data. Verification is unambiguous and enforceable via ID checks.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Role and verification mechanism clearly defined

policies.policy_text: Access to 'RareBooksCollection' is permitted between June 1, 2025, and December 1, 2026. Users must anonymize the 'name' field in any derived dataset before storage.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Start/end dates provide enforceable temporal boundaries, and anonymization requirement ensures privacy without ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Temporal and data transformation requirements clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The 'OralTraditionsArchive' dataset may be used only for educational purposes. Commercial use is prohibited. Verification is performed on declared purpose at the point of access.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Clear purpose restriction prevents ambiguity, with technical enforcement possible through access logging and purpose declaration.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Usage purpose explicitly defined and enforceable

policies.policy_text: Münzkabinett Museum must pay a fee of 500 euros for digitization of the 'Todestag' artwork. Payment verification is required before access.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Specifies amount, party, and service. Enforcement is measurable and unambiguous.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Financial obligation clearly defined

policies.policy_text: Selected cultural datasets are available free of charge if used solely for non-commercial marketing purposes to enhance the institution's visibility. Purpose is verified via submitted use declaration.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Access condition clearly defined and verifiable; the policy is enforceable without ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Conditional access tied to verifiable purpose

policies.policy_text: Access to 'ArchiveArtifact' datasets is allowed only if the declared purpose corresponds to an ArchiveEvent. Semantic classification of declared purpose is verified using the DRK ontology.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Access control is based on verifiable semantic class; the policy is specific, measurable, and implementable.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Semantic constraint explicitly verifiable

policies.policy_text: Access to the 'UC4 Partner' dataset is allowed only before January 1, 2030, 09:00:01. Dataset usage is restricted to users physically located in Germany, verified via IP geolocation.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Future date and location restriction are both precise and enforceable, with no contradictions.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Temporal and geographic constraints measurable and consistent

policies.policy_text: UC4 partners may view a maximum of 50 images per calendar day from the 'Daten Raumkultur' dataset. Count resets at midnight local time.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Quantitative limit is enforceable and measurable; the reset interval avoids ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Numerical usage limit and reset interval clearly defined

policies.policy_text: Access via the 'Daten Raumkultur Connector' is permitted exclusively for the named UC4 Partner. No additional restrictions apply to the number of connector instances they operate.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Exclusive access to a defined actor is clearly stated and measurable. No ambiguities in connector instance count.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Exclusive access rights clearly scoped

policies.policy_text: The UC4 Partner may use the dataset 'http://w3id.org/drk/ontology/d1234' up to 30 times. Each usage must be logged for audit purposes.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Specifies exact count limit and requires logging, making the policy measurable and enforceable without ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Numerical usage limit is clearly defined and enforceable

policies.policy_text: UC4 Partner may access the image dataset 'http://w3id.org/drk/ontology/d1234' solely for training and evaluation. All images must be anonymized before usage to remove identifiable information.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Specifies both purpose and anonymization requirement. Enforcement is measurable and ensures privacy without ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Purpose-limited access with clear privacy requirements

policies.policy_text: Subscribers of the 'ShowTimesAPI' at DE_Staatstheater_Augsburg, including 'Culture Research Institute' and 'Cultural Platform Bavaria', may access cultural assets. Access limited to Germany, expires on May 10, 2025.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: All constraints are measurable and enforceable; expiration date is in the future relative to current time.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Actors, geography, and expiration clearly defined

policies.policy_text: Public access is allowed to digital reproductions of 'Große Düne' by C. D. Friedrich. Museum Münzkabinett may view, download, and share images for non-commercial purposes.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Access actions and non-commercial limitation are enforceable without ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Specific asset, actions, and usage limitations clearly defined

policies.policy_text: DE_Staatstheater_Augsburg provides free access to 'HistoricalArchives' for educational purposes and scientific research. Scholars may explore the dataset without fees.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Conditional access is clearly defined with measurable beneficiaries and no ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Fee waiver tied to verifiable purpose

policies.policy_text: Users must register with ORCID or email to access the ArchiveEvent repository at Münzkabinett. Only authenticated users may view or download the dataset.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Specifies credentials and permitted actions. Enforcement is straightforward and unambiguous.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Authentication requirements are clearly specified

policies.policy_text: Approved data scientists may access MedResearch clinical trial data for secondary analysis after: 1) anonymization, 2) Ethics Committee approval, 3) use on secured servers, 4) pre-publication review 14 days before release. Access duration: 180 days from approval.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Each stage has specific, enforceable requirements. No contradictions exist between conditions.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Comprehensive workflow with measurable requirements

policies.policy_text: Consumer at https://www.example.com/consumer must inform provider at https://www.example.com/provider each time 'File 1' is used.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Defines a measurable obligation for transparency, supporting accountability and enforceability.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Clear requirement for reporting usage events

policies.policy_text: Consumer must delete 'https://www.example.com/data1.csv' before 2027-07-10T00:00:00Z, as specified by provider.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Temporal obligation is specific, measurable, and enforceable, ensuring compliance with data minimization principles.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Deletion deadline clearly defined

policies.policy_text: Provider must update 'File 1' every 30 seconds to maintain freshness. Update logs must be recorded.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Enforceable and quantifiable, ensuring dataset remains current without contradictions.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Update interval is clearly defined and measurable

policies.policy_text: Provider may distribute 'File 1' only after SHACL validation using shape at http://example.com/shacl-shape. Quality check occurs before usage or sharing.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: SHACL validation is a measurable precondition, ensuring data integrity and consistency.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Enforceable quality control step defined

policies.policy_text: Consumer must aggregate 100% of 'File 1' when using the dataset. Aggregation logs must be retained.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Specifies complete aggregation requirement, measurable and enforceable without ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Aggregation obligation clearly quantified

policies.policy_text: Consumer may read up to 1024 MiB of 'File 1'. System logs must track cumulative read size.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Enforceable via monitoring read operations; limit is precise and measurable.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Numerical limit on read operations clearly defined

policies.policy_text: Consumer may read 'File 1' at a maximum bandwidth of 20 MBit/s. Bandwidth usage is monitored per session.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Quantitative limit on data transfer ensures fair usage; monitoring allows enforcement without ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Bandwidth limit measurable and enforceable

policies.policy_text: Consumer may maintain up to 5 concurrent active connections to 'File 1'. Connections beyond limit are rejected automatically.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Max connections enforceable technically; policy is precise and measurable.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Concurrent connection limit clearly defined

policies.policy_text: Access to 'File 1' is permitted only to members of the 'Mobility Dataspace'. Provider is https://www.example.com/provider.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Membership verification allows enforceable access control with no ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Membership requirement clearly specified

policies.policy_text: Access to selected datasets may require sequential conditions: 1) fee payment, 2) authentication, 3) purpose declaration. Each step must be verified before granting access.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Each condition is measurable, sequential, and enforceable without contradictions, ensuring practical implementation.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Sequential, enforceable conditions clearly defined

policies.policy_text: Access to datasets such as 'ImageArtwork', 'PhysicalArtwork', and 'ArchiveEvent' is permitted only to approved researchers affiliated with recognized institutions or registered dataspace participants. All other users are denied access.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy establishes clear role-based constraints, specifying the permitted users (approved researchers, university members, dataspace participants) and denying all others. The constraint is measurable and enforceable, making it a realistic and implementable access control rule within the DRK dataspace framework.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy clearly defines access based on specific roles or membership

policies.policy_text: All data consumers accessing 'ArchiveEvent' datasets must log every read or download action and notify the provider within 24 hours of access.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy establishes a measurable obligation for logging and reporting all dataset access events. The 24-hour notification requirement is precise and enforceable, ensuring transparent use without ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy enforces accountability and transparency for data usage

policies.policy_text: The data consumer must permanently delete the dataset 'SensitiveCulturalData' by 2026-12-31T23:59:59Z after project completion, as mandated by the provider.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy specifies a precise deletion deadline to comply with data minimization principles. The constraint is unambiguous and technically feasible, aligning with standard ethical and legal requirements.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy defines a clear temporal data retention limit

policies.policy_text: When using the dataset 'MuseumRecords', the consumer is required to aggregate all records for statistical analysis and reporting purposes.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy defines a specific and enforceable duty to aggregate the dataset completely. The requirement is quantifiable, supporting consistent data analysis and preventing partial usage that could lead to misinterpretation.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy sets a clear, measurable obligation for aggregation

policies.policy_text: Access to the dataset 'HighResImages' is limited to a maximum of 3 concurrent connections per consumer to avoid server overload.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy establishes a measurable constraint on concurrent usage, ensuring technical stability and enforceability. The limit is clear and implementable without ambiguity.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy defines a precise limit on simultaneous connections

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'TemporaryExhibitionImages' may only be accessed between 2025-06-01 and 2025-12-31. Access outside this window is strictly prohibited.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy defines precise temporal constraints for dataset access. The start and end dates are explicit and enforceable, ensuring the policy can be implemented without ambiguity or contradiction.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy clearly specifies access time window

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'DRK_CulturalImages' is assigned by the dataset creator (assigner) and may be used by all registered DRK dataspace participants (assignees). The dataset is licensed under CC-BY 4.0: users may share and adapt the data for any purpose, provided proper attribution is given to the assigner. No restrictions apply beyond attribution.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy represents the standard CC-BY 4.0 license in a cultural data space context. Permissions include sharing and derivative works; duty requires attribution to the assigner; no prohibitions. Assigners and assignees are explicitly stated for clarity and enforcement.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy provides clear CC-BY 4.0 licensing terms with assigner and assignee clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'DRK_HeritageDocuments' is assigned by the dataset creator (assigner) and may be accessed by all verified DRK dataspace participants (assignees). Licensed under CC-BY-NC 4.0, users may share and adapt the dataset for non-commercial purposes only, and attribution to the assigner is mandatory. Commercial use is prohibited.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy enforces CC-BY-NC 4.0 licensing: sharing and derivative works allowed for non-commercial purposes; duty requires attribution; commercial use is prohibited. Assigner and assignee roles are clearly specified for policy enforcement and automated reasoning.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy provides clear non-commercial licensing terms with assigner and assignee explicitly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'DRK_AncientMaps' is assigned by the providing institution (assigner) and may be used by registered DRK dataspace participants (assignees). Licensed under CC-BY-NC-ND 4.0, users may share the dataset non-commercially, must provide attribution to the assigner, and are strictly prohibited from creating derivative works.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy represents CC-BY-NC-ND 4.0: sharing allowed non-commercially, attribution required, derivatives prohibited. Roles of assigner and assignee are explicitly mentioned for clarity and implementability.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy enforces non-commercial, no-derivative licensing with assigner and assignee clearly stated

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'DRK_MuseumAudio' is assigned by the data provider (assigner) and accessible to all verified DRK dataspace participants (assignees). Licensed under CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0, users may share and adapt the dataset for non-commercial purposes, must provide attribution to the assigner, and any derivative work must carry the same license as the original. Commercial use is prohibited.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy enforces CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0: permissions allow sharing and derivatives for non-commercial purposes; duties include attribution and ShareAlike; commercial use prohibited. Assigner and assignee roles are explicitly included.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy clearly defines non-commercial, share-alike licensing with explicit assigner and assignee

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'DRK_HistoricalPhotographs' is assigned by the dataset creator (assigner) and may be used by all registered participants of the DRK dataspace (assignees). Licensed under CC-BY-SA 4.0, users may share and adapt the dataset for any purpose, provided proper attribution is given to the assigner, and any derivative work must use the same license as the original.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy represents CC-BY-SA 4.0: sharing and derivatives allowed for any purpose; duty requires attribution and ShareAlike; no prohibitions beyond those. Assigner and assignee are clearly mentioned to support automated reasoning and compliance checks.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy enforces full sharing and derivative permissions with attribution and share-alike, with assigner and assignee clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'HistoricPhotos2024' may be shared and adapted for any purpose by 'CulturalDataConsumer' as assigned by 'NationalArchives'. Attribution must always be given to 'NationalArchives'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy provides full sharing and derivative permissions under CC-BY 4.0, specifying both the assigner and the assignee for explicit rights enforcement.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Clear CC-BY 4.0 licensing with assigner and assignee specified

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'MuseumArtifacts' may be shared or adapted non-commercially by 'UniversityResearchLab' with attribution to 'CityMuseum'. Commercial use is prohibited.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy enforces CC-BY-NC 4.0 with explicit assigner and assignee, enabling automated validation of non-commercial constraints.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Non-commercial licensing clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'TemporaryExhibitionImages' may only be accessed by 'GalleryPartner' between 2025-06-01 and 2025-12-31. Access outside this window is prohibited.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy enforces a strict temporal constraint and defines the assignee for automated access control.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy specifies clear access time window with assignee

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalEventsData' may be accessed by 'EventResearchTeam' up to 5 times as assigned by 'CityCulturalOffice'. Further access requests are denied.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This N-times usage policy ensures automated enforcement of access counts for the designated assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Maximum number of usages clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'HistoricMaps' may be used by 'GeographyDept' for a duration of 10 hours after download, as assigned by 'NationalLibrary'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Duration-based access allows automated enforcement of data use for a defined period for the specified assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Usage duration clearly specified

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'TemporaryExhibitionCatalog' may be used by 'ExhibitionTeam' from 2025-05-01 to 2025-10-31. After this period, the dataset must be deleted as assigned by 'MuseumAdmin'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Combines temporal constraints with a post-duty DELETE action, explicitly assigning rights to the assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy specifies access interval and post-duty deletion

policies.policy_text: Access to the dataset 'CulturalHeritageAudio' by 'AudioResearchTeam' must be logged to the clearing house as assigned by 'CityArchives'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy enforces usage logging for accountability, specifying both assigner and assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Logging requirements clearly specified

policies.policy_text: When 'DigitalArtTeam' accesses the dataset 'DigitalArtCollection', a notification must be sent to 'https://culturaldata.gov/log' as assigned by 'NationalGallery'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Automated notifications allow real-time monitoring of dataset access for the specified assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Notification URL specified with assigner and assignee

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'ArchivalPhotos' may only be accessed via the connector 'https://partner-connector.govdata.de' by 'ArchiveResearcher', as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Connector-restricted usage ensures the data is only accessible through an authorized endpoint for the specified assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Policy restricts access to specific connector

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'SensitiveCulturalData' may only be accessed by 'CulturalSecurityTeam' if the connector uses 'TRUST_SECURITY_PROFILE', as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy enforces connector security requirements for access by the designated assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Security level restriction clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'MuseumInventory' may only be used by users with the role 'Curator' as assigned by 'CityMuseum'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Restricting dataset usage to a specific role ensures proper data governance within cultural institutions.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Role-based access clearly specified

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'RegionalArtifacts' may only be accessed within Germany by 'RegionalResearchGroup', as assigned by 'FederalCulturalOffice'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy enforces geographic constraints to comply with national data sharing regulations.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Location-based access clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'EthnographicInterviews' may only be used for academic research purposes by 'UniversityAnthropologyDept', as assigned by 'CulturalDataCenter'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Purpose restriction ensures dataset is used only for the intended research objectives by the designated assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Purpose-based access clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'ExhibitionCatalog2025' may only be accessed by 'ExhibitionTeam' during the event dates 2025-08-01 to 2025-08-31, as assigned by 'CityMuseum'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: This policy enforces temporal access tied to a specific event for the designated assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Event-based access window clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalStatistics2025' may be accessed by 'StatsResearchTeam' under a monthly rental agreement, as assigned by 'FederalCulturalOffice'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Data rental ensures continued access under financial and temporal constraints, assigned to a specific assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Periodic payment and access rights clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'OpenCulturalData' may be freely accessed by 'AllRegisteredUsers' as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Simple permission granting access without restrictions, with assigner and assignee specified.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Unrestricted access clearly granted

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'ArchivalPhotos' may only be accessed via the connector 'https://partner-connector.govdata.de' by 'ArchiveResearcher', as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Restricts dataset access to a defined connector for a specific assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Access restricted to a specific connector

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'MuseumArtifacts3D' may only be used within the application 'VirtualMuseumViewer' by 'MuseumTechTeam', as assigned by 'CityMuseum'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Ensures dataset is used only within the authorized application by the designated assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Access restricted to specific application

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'TemporaryExhibitionImages' may only be accessed by 'GalleryPartner' between 2025-06-01 and 2025-12-31. Access outside this interval is prohibited, as assigned by 'MuseumAdmin'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Defines explicit temporal window for access by the assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Time interval clearly specified

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'HistoricMaps' may be used by 'GeographyDept' for 10 hours after download, as assigned by 'NationalLibrary'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Limits access duration from the start time for the designated assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Duration of usage clearly specified

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'RegionalArtifacts' may only be accessed within Germany by 'RegionalResearchGroup', as assigned by 'FederalCulturalOffice'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Restricts access based on the assignee's physical location.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Geographic restriction clearly specified

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalStatistics2024' may be purchased once by 'StatsResearchTeam' for perpetual use, as assigned by 'FederalCulturalOffice'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Specifies financial and access rights for assignee under a one-time sale.
metadata.acceptance_reason: One-time purchase granting perpetual access

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalStatistics2025' may be accessed by 'StatsResearchTeam' under a monthly rental agreement, as assigned by 'FederalCulturalOffice'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Defines usage rights over a specified rental period for the designated assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Periodic access under rental agreement

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'MuseumInventory' may only be used by users with the role 'Curator', as assigned by 'CityMuseum'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Access limited to specific roles ensures governance of sensitive cultural data.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Role-based access clearly specified

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'EthnographicInterviews' may only be used for academic research by 'UniversityAnthropologyDept', as assigned by 'CulturalDataCenter'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Restricts usage to the stated purpose for the assigned assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Purpose-based access clearly specified

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'ExhibitionCatalog2025' may only be accessed by 'ExhibitionTeam' during the event dates 2025-08-01 to 2025-08-31, as assigned by 'CityMuseum'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Enforces temporal access tied to a specific event for the assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Event-based access window clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalEventsData' may be accessed up to 5 times by 'EventResearchTeam', as assigned by 'CityCulturalOffice'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Limits access count for automated enforcement of usage policy.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Maximum number of usages clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'SensitiveCulturalData' may only be accessed by 'CulturalSecurityTeam' if the connector uses 'BASE_SECURITY_PROFILE', as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Enforces connector security requirements for the assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Security level restriction clearly defined

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'TemporaryExhibitionCatalog' may be used by 'ExhibitionTeam' from 2025-05-01 to 2025-10-31. After this period, it must be deleted as assigned by 'MuseumAdmin'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Enforces temporal usage followed by automated deletion for the assigned assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Temporal access with post-duty deletion

policies.policy_text: The dataset '3DScanData' may only be modified during transmission by 'DataProcessingTeam', as assigned by 'MuseumTechAdmin'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Specifies the condition under which data may be altered, with assigner and assignee clear.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Modification allowed only in transit

policies.policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalRecordsDB' may only be modified at rest by 'DatabaseAdmin', as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Specifies conditions for modifying stored data with clear assigner and assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Modification allowed only at rest

policies.policy_text: Usage of the dataset 'CulturalHeritageAudio' by 'AudioResearchTeam' must be logged locally and sent to the clearing house, as assigned by 'CityArchives'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Enforces usage logging for accountability, with assigner and assignee specified.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Logging requirements clearly specified

policies.policy_text: When 'DigitalArtTeam' accesses the dataset 'DigitalArtCollection', a notification must be sent to 'https://culturaldata.gov/log', as assigned by 'NationalGallery'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Automated notifications enable real-time monitoring for the assigned assignee.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Notification URL specified with assigner and assignee

policies.policy_text: Access to the dataset 'RestrictedArchiveDocs' is prohibited for all users, as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.

metadata.acceptance_explanation: Prevents access completely, clearly specifying assigner.
metadata.acceptance_reason: Access explicitly denied
